text: The Most Gallant Order of Pahlawan Negara Brunei (), also translated as The Most Gallant Order of the Hero of the State of Brunei, is an order of Brunei. It was established on 28 November 1959 by Sultan Omar Ali Saifuddien III. The order consists of four classes: {| class="wikitable" !Class !Post-nominal !Title |- |First Class |PSPNB |Dato Seri Pahlawan |- |Second Class |DHPNB |Dato Hamzah Pahlawan |- |Third Class |PNB | - |- |Fourth Class |PJB | - |} == References == Category:Orders, decorations, and medals of Brunei Category:Awards established in 1959 Category:1959 establishments in Brunei
title: Order of Pahlawan Negara Brunei
